translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽(The method of exposition in the Paṭṭhāna is as follows:)

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.15. Kusalattika, Sārammaṇaduka🔽Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusala ttika sa ārammaṇa duka  kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ
translated: The Triad of the Wholesome, the Dyad of the Objects

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi  akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ
translated: With a wholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises an unwholesome, object-inconstant state. With a wholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises a unwholesome, object-inconstant state. With a wholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises an unwholesome, object-inconstant state and a unwholesome, object-inconstant state. With a wholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arise three states.

analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an unwholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises an unwholesome, object-inconstant state. With an unwholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises a wholesome, object-inconstant state. With an unwholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arises a wholesome, object-inconstant state and an unwholesome, object-inconstant state. With an unwholesome, object-concomitant state as condition there arise three states.

original: Abyākataṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: abyākatam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: With an unwholesome root cause, and with an object. … (Abbreviated.)🔽With nine roots, with nine dominants, … with three by way of mutual co-existence, … with three as the result, … with nine as the ground.

original: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome object, and with a different object. … (Abbreviated.)🔽With a wholesome object, and with a different object. … (Abbreviated.)

original: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo ca naakusalo naanārammaṇo🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome object, and with a different object. … (Abbreviated.)
With nine roots, … with three as the ground.
